nodes.text: A spaceport was built by the Galactic Republic on the planet Tatooine near the city Mos Osnoe during the Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. It was built to help pay for the war by profiting from the Outer Rim trade. Boorka, a Hutt crime lord on Tatooine, was displeased by the spaceport's presence, and requested General Sev'rance Tann of the Separatists to destroy it in exchange for information he possessed. She destroyed the spaceport successfully.
